events.text:
well well well.. look who we have here.
they call me the huntsman. y'know why?
IT"S BECAUSE I HUNT.
for trees... for my bottle.
wait why do you need wood for a bottle?
That's non of your business kid... and It's rather complicated
Then why did you bring it up?

events.question: but in a  serious note. Have you heard of "the raven"?

events.text:
oh? you do know of [shake]it[/shake]?
well good then.
just be weary.

oh really?
nobody's ever told you?
well consider this a warning.
If you dwell in this underworld but especially places outside populated areas.
you might just find "the raven"
It is a sadistic, apathetic, ruthless "thing".
if you do find the "the raven".
I couldn't care less what happens to you, but you most likely will not see a tomorrow.
either your life is going to pass or
It makes a deal with you.
and let me tell you.
Rumors say. If you make that deal.
[shake]you would rather die than take those deals, they are horrible.[/shake]
if "It" finds you. you will be captured by those raven roots. withering away minute by minute. while you pass out.
If you wake up in time. then you have a choice.
deal or die.
make that be known kid.
just don't ever stray to far from populated areas ok?
don't ever make eye contact with a bird-like creature with a raven mask.
and don't ever be alone while you encouter it ok?
ok, don't let that stop your journey. Just be weary.
and about me?
I will be chopping trees for abit and then I'll head back to the city.
so if you need me. I'll be in the city.
